data.actual_result: Search leaves focus and button does not always work (due to how fast/slow you release your mouse click) and false hover info may appear http://i.imgur.com/EY1C4ut.gif
data.expected_result: Search leaves focus and button works as intended
data.short_description: Member List, Pinned and Mute buttons do not function correctly when Search is focused
data.steps_to_repro: - Click inside of the Search box - Click the Member List, Pinned or Mute button
